altername_name: Abenteuer auf dem Reiterhof: Die Wilden Mustangs
Alexandra Ledermann: La Colline aux Chevaux Sauvages
name: Petz: Horse Club
overview: Tame Wild Mustangs: Go on an adventure discovering and caring for wild horses. Ride with a Friend: Collect hidden bonuses with a pal and redeem cool unlockable items. Care for Your Very Own Foal: Gain the trust of your foals and horses as you raise, nurture, and love them.
